Name: Philip Robert Filshie
Description:
Philip was a trans man who was stabbed in the side by his wife, Joyce Lorraine Filshie.

> Ms. Filshie claimed that her husband was beating her, and she “accidentally” stabbed him in the side, from which he bled to death. He was a 51-year-old, post-op FTM.
>
> She was acquitted of second-degree murder charges.

Source: Toronto Star, November 20, 1995
